verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in my <S%H7879>prayer<s%>: <S%H5341>preserve<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> me from the secret <S%H5475>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%>; from the <S%H7285>insurrection<s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>:
Who <S%H8150>whet<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H1869>bend<s%> their bows to shoot their <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, even <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>:
That they may <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> at the <S%H8535>perfect<s%>: <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> do they <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at him, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> not.

They <S%H2388>encourage<s%> themselves in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>: they <S%H5608>commune<s%> of <S%H2934>laying<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%> <S%H2934>privily<s%>; they <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them?

They search <S%H2664>out<s%> <S%H5766>iniquities<s%>; they <S%H8552>accomplish<s%> a <S%H2664>diligent<s%> <S%H2665>search<s%>: both the <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought of every <S%H376>one<s%> of them, and the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, is <S%H6013>deep<s%>.
But <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at them with an <S%H2671>arrow<s%>; <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> shall they be <S%H4347>wounded<s%>.
So they shall make their own <S%H3956>tongue<s%> to <S%H3782>fall<s%> upon themselves: all that <S%H7200>see<s%> them shall flee <S%H5074>away<s%>.
And all <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; for they shall wisely <S%H7919>consider<s%> of his <S%H4639>doing<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him; and all the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>.
